snippet.title: Operation: BoomSlang! - Steam Early-Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Get Ready for the MADNESS:
17 September 2021
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1474790/Operation_BoomSlang/

Top-Down, Twin-Stick, FMV-Infused, Action-Packed MADNESS!!!:
Operation BoomSlang! is a Garage-Indie Action Game with varying Play Modes (both Multi-Player and Single-Player) centered around hunting creeps, collecting treasure, trading in resources to obtain power-ups and competing in a myriad of different ways, while all being wrapped up in a FMV/Low-CG Hybrid Fever Dream.

Developed and Published by South African Solo-Dev, Tiaan Gerber (Skermunkel).

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

MUSIC BY: neocrey
https://soundcloud.com/neocrey
